titles.title: Crown Him With Many Crowns FOR BMYC 2014

authors.author: George J. Elvey Godfrey Thring Matthew Bridges

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Crown Him with many crowns, The Lamb upon His throne.
Hark! how the heavenly anthem drowns All music but its own!
Awake, my soul and sing Of Him who died for Thee;
And hail Him as thy matchless King Through all eternity.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Crown Him the Lord of life, Who triumphed o'er the grave.
Who rose victorious to the strife, For those He came to save.
His glories now we sing, Who died and rose on high.
Who died eternal life to bring, And lives that death may die.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Crown Him the Lord of heaven: One with the Father known,
One with the Spirit Through Him given
From yonder glorious throne. All hail, Redeemer, hail!
For Thou hast died for me; Thy praise and glory shall not fail
Throughout eternity.
